parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: IsOnline
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the target cluster is online. 

**Note** This parameter is used for compatibility with earlier versions and can be left empty. When left empty, it specifies negation for the value of `isRemote`.

parameters.name: IsRemote
parameters.description: This parameter is provided for compatibility with earlier versions and can be left empty.

parameters.name: RestoreMode
parameters.description: The restore method. This parameter is required when `IsRemote` is set to `true`, and is optional otherwise.

parameters.name: RestoreObjectType
parameters.description: The type of the restore object.

parameters.name: SetId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup set.
